body.name: Britax Grove™ Modular Stroller, Lightweight Stroller with CozyFit™ Insert and Bumper Bar, 6 Ways to Ride, SafeWash, Pindot Onyx
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 2 hrs 29 mins
features: LIGHTWEIGHT TODDLER STROLLER: The Britax Grove Modular Stroller is durable and reliable without the extra weight

SIX WAYS TO STROLL: For children up to 50 pounds, this single stroller switches between parent-facing and forward-facing, includes a CozyFit insert to fit babies from 10 pounds, and pairs with select infant car seats

MACHINE-WASHABLE INSERT: CozyFit insert is washer and dryer-friendly, and the stroller liner and head pad resists stains, moisture and odor; fabric is naturally flame-retardant with no added flame-retardant chemicals
TRAVEL WITH EASE: Compatible with Britax Willow, Willow S car seats, and can also be used with select premium brands
ONE-HAND FOLD: This portable stroller is made for multi-tasking and folds with one hand, freeing up your other hand for your holding baby or additional gear
MOVE SMOOTH, STROLL STEADY: Britax stroller features all-wheel suspension and tough, no-flat tires
COOL AND COVERED: Water-resistant, UPF 50+ expandable canopy with flip-down sun visor protects your tiny passenger from sun and rain, while a peek-a-boo window lets you check on your little one
BUMPER BAR: Included bumper bar easily attaches to the stroller frame, giving your child a place to rest their arms
LASTS FOR THE LONG HAUL: Fade-free canopy and no-scuff footrest stay looking like new, mile after mile
MORE STORAGE: An extra large cargo basket plus five additional pockets hold valuables, drinks and your little one’s must-haves
body.description: The Britax Grove™ Modular Stroller is built to elevate your everyday routine as a parent. With thoughtful extras like a stroller bumper bar for added comfort, an expandable canopy for more coverage, mesh windows for extra ventilation, and all-wheel suspension for a smoother ride. Made for children up to 50 pounds, this baby stroller features six different strolling positions—including both parent-facing and forward-facing—plus it's compatible with select infant car seats (sold separately). Made with StayClean® and SafeWash® fabrics, the stroller liner resists stains, moisture and odor. It is also safe to machine wash and dry. The included CozyFit™ insert allows babies as small as 10 pounds to ride in this stroller when the seat is fully reclined. The water-resistant, UPF 50+ canopy with a peek-a-boo window has a flip-down sun visor for comfortable coverage. With an extra-large cargo basket and thoughtfully-placed pockets, this baby stroller gives you easy access to items. The one-hand compact fold lets you easily pack up this lightweight stroller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Our 9 month old loves it
reviews.reviewText: I've include pictures with a bear that's about the size of a newborn, and then one of our 9 month old daughter with all the padding in and one with it taken out. The padding gives you a lot of adjustability, there's the grey insert that you can see, but there's also a foam wedge behind it that can help if you want to take up some slack in the straps.We haven't had a Britax stroller before but we do have a BOB jogging stroller and a Silver Cross Jet 4 and we really like both of them. This review will mostly be comparing the Britax Grove against our BOB and Silver Cross strollers. This Britax Grove fits nicely in between our big BOB jogger and our super portable Silver cross.If you haven't bought a stroller before make sure you pay attention to wheel size, if your stroller has really small wheels they will get hung up on all kinds of stuff. Totally fine if you're only planning on using it on super smooth surfaces, but if you have really tiny wheels you might get tripped up by small cracks in the sidewalk. Our Silver Cross Jet 4 has wheels that are small enough to be annoying if the going gets rough at all. The BOB jogger is a tank with awesome huge wheels that will roll over neighborhood dogs and barely feel it. The wheels on the Britax Grove are somewhere in the middle of the two, but I'd say they will handle 99% of normal urban environments very smoothly.One thing we noticed right away about the Grove is the simplicity of operation, everything was really intuitive. Assembling it when we first got it was straightforward and folding it down for storage is very easy and intuitive.The only negative that I have to say about the Britax Grove is that the connection between the seat and the frame has some wobble to it. It feels plenty secure to me, I don't think it's a safety issue, but when you get into this price point I'd expect a little bit more of a premium, tighter fit. I will say that one benefit of the looser fit is that it's really easy to remove the seat assembly and to drop it back into place. I don't feel that the wobble is a big enough factor for me to knock a whole star off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worht every penny!
reviews.reviewText: The quality is super great! I love it! Easy to fold and unfold. Easy to clean and looks nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smaller but with all the perks of a big stroller
reviews.reviewText: I wish I had a stroller like this, when my oldest was a baby! This packs, the punch of your standard bulky stroller, and your travel system that comes with your pumpkin carrier. But it does it while also being smaller, lighter, and smooth. I love the storage and the fact that this knocks out the need for an umbrella stroller or a bulky stroller! When you’re lugging a baby around the last thing you want to do is fight with a heavy stroller! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High end feel and assets
reviews.reviewText: So easy to assemble, thank goodness. Unit has some great features: water resistant, visor flips down, can wash inserts in machine, makes travel more efficient as some car seats are comparable, not heavy and folds down with one hand. This is well built and will adjust beautifully as child grows and uses change. The price is more than reasonable. I really love the solid feel to this and the sound the wheels make when in use. There are no squeaky sounds, just a low humming of great quality and great design. Highly recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Oh I love this stroller! I've tried just about every tier of strollers of the same kind, and this one is nice. Smooth ride, large back wheels, and I love that it tilts back so the baby can sleep.However, the stroller is not reclining per se. The whole piece tilts, but you can't adjust the angle of the back. Which is fine by me since I only even use two angles-sit up and lay down.I absolutely love the giant roomy basket at the bottom. It fits so much anf has plenty of space to actually put the bags in-as in you have enough gap between the basket and the seat to get the bags(or whatever you gonna put there) in and out. Super easy to fold and u fold. Expandable hood is a nice bonus-and you can use the peek window whether the hood is expanded or not.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Has lightweight and compact size
reviews.reviewText: It is lightweight and compact, fitting easily into a sedan car. The wheels are of excellent quality, and the interior is lined with a soft material. It offers great versatility, usable in various directions. Adding small tools like sound music or LEDs would enhance its appeal for kids. Furthermore, incorporating wheel options to absorb weight and pressure would be beneficial, although it is already sufficiently sturdy for prolonged use.

reviews.reviewText: This stroller is amazing and versatile made with great quality for longevity has very smooth wheels so it want disturb sleeping baby’s
